src:
Timo Werner Diincar MU dan Liverpool, Begini Respon RB Leipzig
04 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Direktur Olahraga RB Leipzig, Markus Krosche memberikan tanggapan terkait rumor ketertarikan Liverpool dan Manchester United terhadap Timo Werner. Krosche menegaskan pihaknya sama sekali tidak berencana untuk menjual sang striker.
Nama Werner dalam dua musim terakhir meroket di Bundesliga. Sang striker bisa dikatakan menjadi pesaing yang serius untuk Robert Lewandowski sebagai pemenang trofi sepatu emas Bundesliga setiap tahunnya.
Ketajaman striker muda Jerman itu tentunya menarik perhatian sejumlah klub top Eropa. Belakangan ini dua tim top Inggris, Liverpool dan Manchester United diyakini ingin membajak sang striker di bulan Januari nanti.
Kedua tim itu saat ini tengah kekurangan opsi untuk lini serang mereka. Itulah mengapa United dan Liverpool sangat tertarik membeli Striker Timnas Jerman tersebut.

Lantas bagaimana reaksi RB Leipzig mendengar rumor ini? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Timo Werner Targeted by MU and Liverpool, Here's the Response of RB Leipzig
Nov 04 2019, 19:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - RB Leipzig's Sports Director Markus Krosche has responded in response to rumors of Liverpool and Manchester United's interest in Timo Werner. Krosche insisted his side had no plans to sell the striker.
Werner's name in the last two seasons skyrocketed in the Bundesliga. The striker can be said to be a serious contender for Robert Lewandowski as the winner of the Bundesliga gold shoe trophy every year.
The sharpness of the young German striker certainly attracts the attention of a number of top European clubs. Recently two of England's top teams, Liverpool and Manchester United, are believed to want to hijack the striker in January.
Both teams are currently lacking options for their attack lines. That is why United and Liverpool are very interested in buying the German national team striker.

So how did RB Leipzig react to hearing this rumor? Check out the information below.
